text:
e="preserve">Céline Ferer (born 21 June 1991) is a French rugby union player. She played for the France women's national rugby union team. She played in the 2015 Women's Six Nations Championship, 2017 Women's Rugby World Cup, and 2020 Women's Six Nations Championship.
She played with Stade Toulousain.

annotations.surface_form: France women's national rugby union team
